data.message: A friend of mine died of breast cancer and her site is still active..??? Pat Killiam.

replies.message: We’re sorry for your loss, Lily. It is our policy to memorialize the account of a deceased person. If you need to report a Timeline to be memorialized, please contact us here: http://on.fb.me/1DWRZjd -Chantal
I can appreciate the idea, having lost several friends who are "still active" i revisit every once in a while
I too have a few friends whose accounts are still active while they are no longer with us.  The birthdays and other news about their lives come up from time to time and we are still here commiserate.
